entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Mont-Joli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:45 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

Visibility: 0.6 km

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 20 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
